subtitle: [Music]
Thinking Allowed. Conversations on the
leading edge of knowledge and discovery
with psychologist Jeffrey Mishlove. Hello
and welcome, I’m Jeffrey Mishlove. Today
I’d like to talk to you about what the
New Thinking Allowed Foundation and the
New Thinking Allowed video channel are
doing with regard to community building.
Now, we have started holding Live Stream
events on YouTube for our general
audience, as well as for our volunteers
separately. This coming Sunday, the 14th
of June, we will be holding a new kind of
live streaming event. I will have a guest
with me. My guest will be Sean McNamara.
His video was just released earlier this
week on Monday.
Now, Sean is a young man. He’s still in
graduate school and he reminds me of myself
when I was in graduate school - at the
time I did my own doctoral dissertation
on training psychic ability. It was
published as a book eventually, Psi
Development Systems. Sean is working
in that same area. He has several books
out now on training telekinesis and
training remote viewing, clairvoyance,
telepathy. We’re going to be focusing
on training of remote viewing,
clairvoyance and telepathy, but this will
be an opportunity for viewers who log
in to the Live Stream to question him
directly and get answers from him
directly. That's what the Live Stream
events are about. It's for immediate
back and forth, interaction of our
community of viewers and either myself
or in this case a guest. Now, the event
will be 2pm Mountain Time, USA, that's
where I live in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
You’re going to have to find out what
that is for you, wherever you are
anywhere in the world. I know half of
our viewers are outside of the United
states. If you can't log in live, there
will be a recording of the event
available. What you do, if you don't
know how to get onto the Live Stream, you
go to newthinkingallowed.com and once
the Live Stream goes live you will see
it and you can click right on it from
there. That's the best information I
can give you about accessing our live
stream videos for the time being. But,
this is just one of a series of efforts
we are now making in the area of
community building. Another similar
effort is called the NTA, for New
Thinking Allowed, PSI Experience Community
on Facebook. You will find a link to
join that Facebook group. I know many of
you don't like to use Facebook, but for
those of you who do there are over a
thousand people on that community now
and it’s a mutual support system for
people who are having psi or psychic
experiences or related unusual
exceptional human experiences, altered
states of consciousness, spiritual
experiences and the like. It's a mutual
support community. It's an opportunity to
engage with other people who are viewing
this channel. We are putting up three
videos every week, not even counting the
monologues like this. So, we’re
giving you as much information
really as I can, as I have the time to do
in a day. I want people to be aware of
so much that’s going on now, so many
exciting and important things and great
videos that are coming up. Now, another
aspect of our community building efforts
is our newsletter. I’ve been publishing a
weekly newsletter, most of you don't know
it because it's only been going out up
until now to our volunteers, our donors
and our customers on our website. But, I
think the time has come to open it up to
listeners in general. We don't yet
have a sign-in sheet on our website but
we will soon. For the time being, if
you want to get that weekly newsletter,
and I’ll explain why you might want to
get it, send me an email to
friends@newthinkingallowed.com,
friends@newthinkingallowed.com. I read each
and every one of those emails that come
in. I cannot respond to each and every
one, but if you want the newsletter, for
the time being we’ll put you on that
list. Eventually there will be a regular
sign up sheet that you can just press a
button and subscribe, for free of course,
to that newsletter. Why would you want it?
It gives you advance information about
the videos that are coming out each week.
It gives you information about some of
our other activities and I’m going to
talk about them including, and I see this
as the centerpiece of our community
building activity: our searchable
database. It’s already up and running but
it hasn't been put on the New Thinking
Allowed Foundation website yet. It will
probably be there within a couple of
weeks because it's working so well. You
can type in any search term whatsoever
and it will provide you with links on
all of our videos to where that search
term is being discussed in the video.
It will take you right to the spot. Now, how
is that a community building activity?
I’ll explain because it's going to work,
it does work right now, on all the
New Thinking Allowed videos. But we're also
adding in the original Thinking Allowed
series videos. Some of you may not know
that before I launched the New Thinking
Allowed series in 2015,
between the years 1986 and 2002 we had a
public television series that went out
over satellite, was covered all over
North America at one time by about
120 television stations,
public TV stations in the United States
and Canada. There’s a separate
YouTube channel for the original
Thinking Allowed series and we're adding
in those videos into the searchable
database. But you see, we have if you look
on our homepage at newthinkingallowed.com,
you'll see there's ten featured
channels, other people's YouTube channels
that we feel are compatible with ours,
that cover the same kind of material
about consciousness and psychic
functioning in a responsible way. We can
begin adding in their videos into our
searchable database and so the
searchable database then becomes a
resource for this network of related
organizations and institutions. If
you're viewing this now and you have a
YouTube channel or you're affiliated
with an organization that has related
videos and you'd like to be included in
our searchable database we can work with
you on that at no cost to yourself
either. I see it as a resource for the
community. As some of you may recall
if you've watched this little
three-minute introductory video on the
newthinkingallowed.com homepage, my
interest initially in setting up this
channel was because I had a unique
doctoral degree in parapsychology, a
unique vision for parapsychology not
merely as an experimental science
alongside of conventional psychology but
as a discipline that included the
thousands of
years of history of human beings
engaging with this elusive phenomena we
call psi or psychic functioning,
including the possibility of survival
after death. Well, I thought that we would
be creating a resource, because here I am
40 years after having received this
unique degree, the only accredited
doctoral diploma that actually says
parapsychology issued anywhere in the
world either before or since. Well, it's kind
of lonely. But I was hopeful and I still
am very hopeful that eventually society
will come around and parapsychology will
probably have a different name by then
but it'll be central to our
understanding of who we are as human
beings. I wanted to create a resource
available for colleges and universities
and educational institutions of all
sorts for that time. I realized after
five years of doing this that we're also
engaged in another project
altogether which is simply, you know, the
expansion of consciousness, the awakening
of awareness about these things in
society at large. That's a very important
part of our mission. And so community
building ties into that. Back in the
original Thinking Allowed series it used
to be the case that groups would form. We
had a half hour video released once a
week and these groups would get together
in their homes and watch us on cable
TV and then they'd be discussing the
videos. Now we are engaged in the process
of setting up a book club. I'm announcing
in the newsletter books that are going
to be released or discussed in future
videos. Another thing that we're doing, if
you take a look at the descriptions that
are attached to each video, we're listing
each and every book that is discussed in
the video. We
even have hot links so that you can
purchase those books should you so
desire through Amazon. It helps us
because we're an Amazon affiliate and we
get a tiny commission, I think it's up to
about $50 a month now. Now, some of you
may be aware that since last February I
have been calling for volunteers. The
reason I feel comfortable asking for
volunteers is that I myself have been
functioning as an unpaid volunteer
putting this series together for the
last five years. In fact, I pay for it out
of my own pocket. And fortunately because
of advertising revenue and because of
donations and because of sales of these
lapel pins and other products on our
website we're at a point where I can
envision, you know maybe in another year,
so I'll actually have earned back the
money I've spent out of pocket. And maybe
someday in the future I hope I can
actually help pay for some of my
retirement, for some of the revenue that
comes from this video channel. But for
the time being I'm volunteering and
joyfully so. It is really a work of love
as far as I'm concerned. And that's why
for those of you who feel so motivated,
so inspired, who feel the love and would
like to contribute alongside of me, I
welcome you. We now have over 300
volunteers who are doing wonderful,
wonderful things. Amongst them we've got
our shopping cart up and running. You
can purchase some of the original
rainbow yin-yang pieces that I have
designed. I actually have the copyright
on like 800 different variations of the
rainbow yin-yang. I make a few of
those available. You can get a 12 by 12
print, photographic quality, hand signed
by me for $40 on our website. People
have donated artwork.
Some of our guests have donated
signed copies of their books. Things
like that you can now purchase on our
website. I encourage you to take a look
at it and of course donations are
welcome also. But in particular we can
use more volunteers. The volunteers are
translating our interviews into over a
dozen different languages. And of course
in order to create a good
translation we need a good edited
English transcript. The English
transcripts are then being uploaded to
YouTube in terms of the captions and
subtitles so that the searchable
database is accurate, because the
automated subtitles that YouTube
provides are very nice, it helps us a
great deal with the searchable database,
but the truth is they may be 90%
accurate, 95% if we're lucky. We want a
hundred percent accurate transcripts
in the searchable database for the
benefit of readers, viewers and scholars
who will be digging into it in
the future. Let me come back to the
book club.
We hope to be able to set up groups of
people around the country getting
together, watching the videos and
discussing the books. That's another
example of community building. I
think you'll find as we go forward many,
many more instances of community
building along the way because I believe
strongly in communities. I think that if
you want to really heighten, awaken,
expand your consciousness one of the
best ways to do it is to have a
supportive community around you. One
of the best ways that supportive
communities can strengthen each other is
to have a resource like New Thinking
Allowed putting out
three times a week, giving you a
searchable database, a book club, a
newsletter and opportunities for various
members of this larger network of
communities: researchers, spiritual groups,
groups on the frontier of psychology,
transpersonal psychology, humanistic
psychology, etc., to interact with each
other, to cross-fertilize each other.
That's what I hope the legacy of the New
Thinking Allowed channel will be, that we
can look back maybe in 20 years, I hope
to be alive in 20 years, I hope to be
still doing this in 20 years, and say
that we have built a movement that is
really impacting our culture as a whole
because I think it is sorely needed. Once
again let me remind you about the
Live Stream coming up this Sunday with
Sean McNamara who is training
telekinesis,
remote viewing, clairvoyance and
telepathy. This will be your chance to
ask Sean questions directly about the
work that he does. Sunday 2:00, USA
Mountain time. I'll be with you then for
those of you who log in. And for those of
you who have been watching thank you for
being with me.
[Music]
